issue.title: [C++] Add UTF8 conversion modes in CSV reader conversion options
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3407](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3407). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There should be a few options:

- Assume UTF8, but do not verify ("no seatbelts mode", for users that have reasonable security about UTF8 and want the maximum performance)
  
- Full UTF8 verification
  
- Maybe ASCII-only verification (because ASCII verification is very fast)
